assetProfile.address2: 18th Floor Jl. Jend. Gatot Subroto Kav. 1-3 Jakarta Selatan, DKI
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: PT Digital Mediatama Maxima Tbk provides digital trade solutions, cloud-based platform, and end-to-end management services. It offers infrastructure-as-a-service, such as hardware rent-out, monitoring, management, and troubleshooting; and managed service, including digital content scheduling, distribution, and update status monitoring, as well as operates advertising exchange hub that provides digital advertising slots. The company also operates digital commerce platform, a B2B marketplace, which integrates to various digital and physical product channels; and ChatFoto, a chat-based photo printing service platform. In addition, it engages in the land transportation, and computer programming businesses; and trading of machinery, computers and computer equipment, telecommunication equipment, and software products. Further, the company offers telecommunication, information technology, agricultural, computer consulting, education, meeting organizing, incentive trip, conference and exhibition, and other computer facilities management services; develops application and video games; and publishes newspapers, journals, and bulletins or magazines. Additionally, it engages in the organizing of special events; management of other sports facilities; promotion of sports activities; and other activities related to sports. The company was formerly known as PT Digital Marketing Solution and changed its name to PT Digital Mediatama Maxima Tbk in January 2019. PT Digital Mediatama Maxima Tbk was founded in 2015 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

companyOfficers.name: Imroatul  Wahidah
